text: thm 'iina rabak liladhin faealuu almeasy fi hal jhlhm leaqbtha w'iyjabha lskht allah -fkl eas lilah mkhtyana 'aw mtemdana fahu jahl bhdha alaietibar wa'iin kan ealmana balthrym-, thuma rajaeuu 'iilaa allah emma kanuu ealayh min aldhnwb, wa'aslahuu nfwshm waemalhm, 'iina rabak -min baed tawbatuhum w'islahhm- laghfwr lhm, rahim bhm
